  Class java.Nutmeg.FixedSizeCollection



java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.Nutmeg.Collection
           |
           +----java.Nutmeg.IndexedCollection

                   +----java.Nutmeg.FixedSizeCollection






  
 public class FixedSizeCollection
  
 extends IndexedCollection


Copyright (c) 1995, 1996 THOUGHT Inc. All Rights Reserved.

FixedSizeCollection class (a non-growable array).

A FixedSizeCollection is a subclass of IndexedCollection which has a
fixed/unchangeable length from the point of instantiation.  This is
the parent to our Array class, and restricts certain methods from being
accessed which would counter the fixed length attribute.





  




  
 
	FixedSizeCollection(int, int)
  
 Constructor for FixedSizeCollection with an initial storage capacity
and a specified growSize.
  
 
	FixedSizeCollection(int)
  
 Constructs an empty FixedSizeCollection with the specified storage 
capacity, and a default capacity increment.
  
 
	FixedSizeCollection()
  
 Construct an empty FixedSizeCollection.




  




  
 
	add(Object)
  
 WARNING!
This is not a valid method for this class because this class cannot
grow, and will result in an exception being thrown.
  
 
	clone()
  
 Clone this FixedSizeCollection.
  
 
	removeIfAbsent(Object, DoBlock)
  
 WARNING!
This is not a valid method for this class, and will result in an
exception being thrown.





  




FixedSizeCollection

  public FixedSizeCollection(int initialSize,
                             int growSize)




  
 Constructor for FixedSizeCollection with an initial storage capacity
and a specified growSize.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 initialSize - initial storage capacity of data storage
    
 growSize - the increment that storage should grow by
size doubles if value is 0.
  




FixedSizeCollection

  public FixedSizeCollection(int initialSize)




  
 Constructs an empty FixedSizeCollection with the specified storage 
capacity, and a default capacity increment.  Capacity increment is 
defaulted to 0 using this constructor.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 initialSize - initial storage capacity of data storage.
  




FixedSizeCollection

  public FixedSizeCollection()




  
 Construct an empty FixedSizeCollection.  This defaults to an initial 
storage of 10 and a capacity increment of 0.

clone

  public synchronized Object clone()




  
 Clone this FixedSizeCollection. The objects are not cloned, and are 
references.
If new members are desired, use the deepcopy method.
  

    
 Returns:
    
 a new Object identical to the current one.
    
 Overrides:
